tool_description: Amazon, Ebay, Target, Walmart, Google - price & product data from all marketplaces via one API. The Price Comparison API provides price & product data incl. product title, manufacturer, sellers, reviews, prices, size selection etc.
name: Price Comparison
title: Price Comparison

api_list.name: offers

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description:
An identifier can be any of the following:

- UPC
- EAN
- ISBN
- GTIN
- Amazon ASIN
